DOC.brief_summary: This study aim assess effect hazelnut , cocoa , combination vascular reactivity metabolic profile . Participants , divide six group , receive one breakfast integration 14 day : group 1 ) 30 g peel hazelnut ; group 2 ) 30 g unpeeled hazelnut ; group 3 ) snack 30 g peel hazelnut ; group 4 ) snack 2.5 g cocoa powder ; group 5 ) snack 30 g peel hazelnut 2.5 g cocoa ; group 6 ) empty snack , control group .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Hazelnuts Cocoa Metabolic Parameters Vascular Reactivity
DOC.detailed_description: In last year , prevalence overweight obesity increase age group . The European Food Safety Authority state `` cocoa flavanols help maintain endothelium-dependent vasodilation , contribute normal blood flow '' . Several study report daily consumption hazelnut reduces risk cardiovascular disease . The hypothesis study demonstrate beneficial effect hazelnut cocoa diet integration vascular reactivity endocrine-metabolic parameter .
DOC.criteria: BMI 18.524.9 kg/m2 diabetes mellitus glucose intolerance dyslipidemia metabolic syndrome allergy
